title: Keycloak 26.0.0 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Clarify the behaviour of multiple Operator versions installed in the same    cluster operator  * Better logging when error happens during transaction commit storage   BUGS   * keycloak.js example from the documentation leads to error path    adapter/javascript  * Issue with concurrent user & group delete, unable to cleanup resource server    user-policy & group-policy authorization-services  * Repeated email verifications while logging in through IDP caused by email    case sensitivity authentication  * LDAP Import: KERBEROS_PRINCIPAL not updated when UserPrincipal changes and    user already exists ldap  * Nightly Cypress tests for the Admin Console are failing on Firefox admin/ui  * Login V2: Missing "dir" attributes login/ui  * Admin UI defaults to master realm even without permissions to it admin/ui  * Possible issue with unavailable CryptoIntegration when using    keycloak-authz-client with private_key_jwt and ECDSA algorithm oidc  * Can get authorization code on a non verified user with some specific    kc_action (AIA) oidc  * Keycloak In Docker: ERROR: Strict hostname resolution configured but no    hostname setting provided docs  * Flaky test:    org.keycloak.testsuite.broker.KcOidcBrokerTest#testPostBrokerLoginFlowWithOTP_bruteForceEnabled    ci  * Unable to submit forms in Safari account/ui  * Broken links / anchors after KC26 release docs  * In imported realms, the ability to use environment variables has disappeared    import-export  * Fix runaway asterisk formatting in TLS documentation docs  * Non-optimized start command gives erroneous warnings for runtime spi options    dist/quarkus  * RTL not working on keycloak.v2 login template login/ui  * keycloak-js register broken: createRegisterUrl not awaited adapter/javascript  * Failure to redirect to organization IdP when the organization scope is    included organizations  * Organizations section is shown in account console if organizations is not    enabled for a realm. account/ui  * [Regression] 26.0.0 return empty "access: []" JWT for Docker-v2 Auth    provider, resulting in "access denied" authentication  * Error when adding or removing a user from an organisation when there are 2 or    more Keycloak servers in a cluster organizations  * Upgrade to 26 fails with 'ERROR: index "idx_us_sess_id_on_cl_sess" does not    exist' core  * NPE when device representation cannot be parsed authentication  * NEP when Default Role is not present on CachedRealm infinispan  * [Keycloak CI] - AuroraDB IT - Error creating EC2 runner instance  * [Keycloak CI] - FIPS IT - Failed to fetch maven  * Auth not possible for auth session where user was enabled in the meantime    authentication  * NPE thrown in whoami endpoint admin/ui  * password is a required field admin/ui
